strings.SS2_KNIGHT_DESCRIPTION:
The Knight is a skilled expert in melee combat, dueling and parrying foes with precise timing and execution.

<color=#CCD3E0>< ! > parry.
strings.SS2_KNIGHT_OUTRO_FLAVOR: ..and so he left, battered to the core of hope.
strings.SS2_KNIGHT_OUTRO_FAILURE: ..and so he vanished, shield shattered and hope snuffed out.
strings.SS2_KNIGHT_BODY_LORE: why are there knights in space
strings.SS2_KNIGHT_PASSIVE_DESC: A buff ward surronds you that grants allies in its radius IDK YET IT ISNT WORKING
strings.SS2_KNIGHT_PRIMARY_SWORD_DESC: Slice forward for <style=cIsDamage>X% damage</style>. Every third hit stabs forward for <style=cIsDamage>Y% damage</style>. While blocking, bash enemies for <style=cIsDamage>Z% damage</style>.
strings.SS2_KEYWORD_EMPOWERING: <style=cKeywordName>Empowering</style><style=cSub>Getting struck just after activating blocks the damage, adds two stacks of Fortified, and performs a stunning parry for 950% damage. Empowers next use of Clash's beam to deal +50% more damage and stun.'</style>
strings.SS2_KNIGHT_SECONDARY_SHIELD_DESC: Raise your shield, gaining <style=cIsUtility>X armor</style>. Use before an incoming strike to <style=cIsDamage>parry</style> it and <color=#fa78f3>Empower</color> your next skill.
strings.SS2_KNIGHT_SECONDARY_SHIELD_DESC2: Raise your shield, gaining <style=cIsUtility>X armor</style> and replacing your jump with a <style=cIsUtility>roll</style>. Use before an incoming strike to <style=cIsDamage>parry</style> it and <color=#fa78f3>Empower</color> your next skill.
strings.SS2_KNIGHT_SHIELD_BASH_DESC: Shield Bash in front of you for <style=cIsDamage>240% damage</style> and <style=cIsUtility>stun</style> enemies hit.
strings.SS2_KNIGHT_UTILITY_LEAP_DESC: Leap in the air, slicing repeatedly for <style=cIsDamage>X% damage</style>. The number of hits scales with attack speed.
strings.SS2_KNIGHT_SPECIAL_BANNER_DESC: Thrust a banner into the ground for <style=cIsDamage>X% damage</style>. It grants <style=cIsHealing>health regeneration</style> to nearby allies while <style=cIsUtility>slowing</style> nearby enemies.
